post:
For Black Friday we have created some special --limited-- promotions for the LET community! We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services. All servers are located in Chicago, IL.  
  

--- SSD KVM ---
SolusVM Control Panel
DDoS Protection Included
Discounts Are Recurring

=====


**1GB SSD KVM**
* 2x vCPU @ 2.0GHz
* 1GB RAM
* 15GB SSD
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
* 1 IPv4 (IPv6 Available Upon Request)
* $9/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=91 "Order Here") - Coupon Code: BF20201GB [MAX 10 USES]


=====


20% OFF All other KVM SSD Plans with coupon 'BF2020SSD'. Max 25 uses.
